💰 Membership Options:

• Basic: $39/month (Gym access, group classes)
• Premium: $79/month (Everything + 2 PT sessions)
• Elite: $129/month (Unlimited everything)
• Personal Training: $75/session

responses.email|mail: 📧 You can email us at info@yourbusiness.com and we'll get back to you within 24 hours.

responses.payment|pay|credit card: 💳 We accept cash, credit cards, and online payments. Payment is due at the time of service.

responses.wifi|internet: 📶 Free WiFi is available for our customers.
responses.wheelchair|accessible: ♿ Our facility is fully wheelchair accessible with ramps and accessible restrooms.

customization.welcome_message: 👋 Hi! I'm here to help with basic questions about {business_name}. What would you like to know?
customization.fallback_message: I'm sorry, I don't have information about that. Could you try asking about our hours, location, services, or contact information?
